Events for the 2014-2015

October



October 18-19: IHSA Show at West Texas A&M University (Canyon, TX)

November



November 1-2: IHSA Show at the University of Oklahoma (Norman, OK)

January



January 28, 7-8pm: New member info session (UT room CLA 0.112)

January 31 - February 1: IHSA Show hosted by Texas State University (Dripping Springs, TX)

February



February 4, 7-8pm: New member info session (UT room CLA 0.112)

March



March 6-8: IHSA Show and Regionals at Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, LA)

March 29: Zone Finals (Location TBD)

April



April 30 - May 3: National Finals (West Springfield, MA)
